pageContext.claim: “Obama should not have allowed that to happen -- even with the voter stuff. Supposedly the FBI went to Obama. They told him about it. He didn't do anything about it.”
pageContext.analysis: One could reasonably criticize the Obama administration for not acting more quickly against Russian interference in the 2016 election, but one big problem was Trump himself. He dismissed the possibility that Russia was involved, saying the hack of the Democratic National Committee could have been done by anyone. Obama was wary that any move he made would be seen as tilting the scale against Trump.
